text: Bryant Charles Gumbel (born September 29, 1948) is an American television journalist and sportscaster. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. He is best known for his 15 years as co-host of NBC's Today. He is the younger brother of sportscaster Greg Gumbel. Since 1995, he has hosted HBO's Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel. It has been rated as "flat out TV's best sports program" by the Los Angeles Times.
